item.title: EP 76 - The Boo Pill
item.itunes:title: The Boo Pill
item.description:
Today we travel to Chile and then, oddly enough, to a small German village in Chile that holds dark secrets. Then we explore the world of EVPs. Can a simple recorder pick up the voices of the dead?

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Colonia Dignidad is a Bavarian style town deep inside Chile. Established by a German minister with a less than respectable past, you know things aren't going to end well. But when he teams up with a government intent on shutting down all dissent things quickly go from bad to worse.

Then we look, or listen, to EVPs. With new devices like the Spirit Box, are we on the verge of finally being able to contact the other side?

Finally,  . . . have you take the Boo Pill yet?

Links:

The Torture Colony (Great Article)

https://theamericanscholar.org/the-torture-colony/

Villa Baviera

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villa_Baviera

What happened in Colonia? Inside the terrifying Nazi cult that inspired Emma Watson's new film

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/films/2016/07/01/what-happened-in-colonia-inside-the-terrifying-nazi-cult-that-in/

Colonia Dignidad

https://www.learning-history.com/colonia-dignidad/

The Reformed Nazi Cult trying to Open its Colony to Tourism

http://www.messynessychic.com/2016/02/18/the-reformed-nazi-cult-trying-to-open-its-colony-to-tourism/

Suicide Bridge Pasadena, California - Demon

(Take The Boo Pill!!!)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=178&v=ZyRa2pEOzlQ

Listen to One of the Most Convincing EVP Recordings Ever Captured

https://www.thoughtco.com/the-most-horrific-evp-ever-recorded-2594015

Super Horrifying EVPs That Will Creep You Out

https://www.ranker.com/list/scary-evps/jacob-shelton

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio


Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
